commands.name: az network express-route port authorization create
commands.summary: Create an authorization in the specified express route port.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port authorization create --name
                                                   --port-name
                                                   --resource-group
                                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network express-route port authorization create -g MyResourceGroup --port-name MyPortName --name MyAuthorizationName

commands.name: az network express-route port authorization delete
commands.summary: Delete the specified authorization from the specified express route port.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port authorization delete [--ids]
                                                   [--name]
                                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                   [--port-name]
                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                   [--subscription]
                                                   [--yes]
examples: az network express-route port authorization delete -g MyResourceGroup --port-name MyPortName --name MyAuthorizationName

commands.name: az network express-route port authorization list
commands.summary: List all authorizations in an express route port.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port authorization list --port-name
                                                 --resource-group
                                                 [--max-items]
                                                 [--next-token]
examples: az network express-route port authorization list -g MyResourceGroup --port-name MyPortName

commands.name: az network express-route port authorization show
commands.summary: Get the specified authorization from the specified express route port.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port authorization show [--ids]
                                                 [--name]
                                                 [--port-name]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--subscription]
examples: az network express-route port authorization show -g MyResourceGroup --port-name MyPortName --name MyAuthorizationName

commands.name: az network express-route port authorization update
commands.summary: Update an authorization in the specified express route port.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port authorization update [--add]
                                                   [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                   [--ids]
                                                   [--name]
                                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                   [--port-name]
                                                   [--remove]
                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                   [--set]
                                                   [--subscription]
examples: az network express-route port authorization update -g MyResourceGroup --port-name MyPortName --name MyAuthorizationName

commands.name: az network express-route port authorization wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port authorization wait [--created]
                                                 [--custom]
                                                 [--deleted]
                                                 [--exists]
                                                 [--ids]
                                                 [--interval]
                                                 [--name]
                                                 [--port-name]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--subscription]
                                                 [--timeout]
                                                 [--updated]
